entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs When is the @WhiteHouse or @realDonaldTrump going to apologize for the piss poor handling of the Coronavirus. “Anyone can be tested” only 11,000 tests were given to a country of 350+ million. This Coronavirus is goin to hit us worse than 9/11 and your letting it.
